issues.title: Step-level timeout parameter is ignored
symptoms: {"click": {"selector": "...", "timeout": 5000}} still waits default timeout
Step-level timeout doesn't override global timeout
issues.expected: Step timeout should be honored

issues.title: Frame context doesn't persist across CLI invocations
symptoms: Call switchToFrame, next CLI call reverts to main frame
listFrames shows currentFrameId back to mainFrameId
issues.expected: Frame context should persist with tab session

issues.title: Hover doesn't support coordinates
symptoms: {"hover": {"x": 100, "y": 200}} not supported
Cannot trigger hover on shadow DOM elements without selector
issues.expected: Hover should accept x/y coordinates

issues.title: Key presses in dialogs don't reach input fields
symptoms: Open Monaco Go to Line dialog with Ctrl+G, press number keys - they don't appear in input
Keys may be going to wrong element
issues.expected: Key presses should reach the focused input in dialogs

issues.title: Selection lost when clicking toolbar buttons
symptoms: Select text in WYSIWYG editor with Shift+Arrow
Click Bold button - selection is lost before formatting applies
issues.expected: Option to preserve selection during click

issues.title: Fill with empty string does not clear input
symptoms: {"fill": {"selector": "#search", "value": ""}} doesn't clear the input
Input retains previous value
issues.expected: Fill with empty string should clear the input
issues.workaround: Use eval with input.value = '' + dispatchEvent, or Backspace keypresses

issues.title: Keyboard shortcuts with modifiers don't trigger SPA event handlers
symptoms: Meta+k dispatches keydown but doesn't trigger GitHub command palette
Shortcut works manually in Chrome but not via CDP
SPA applications listen at document level, CDP events may not trigger listeners
issues.expected: Keyboard shortcuts with modifiers should trigger same handlers as physical presses
issues.workaround: Click the button that triggers the same action

issues.title: Invalid CSS selector doesn't show parsing error
symptoms: {"click": "[[[invalid"} times out instead of immediate error
No indication that selector syntax is invalid
issues.expected: Immediate error like 'Invalid CSS selector'

issues.title: Silent exit code 1 without JSON output
symptoms: Some failures return exit code 1 with no stdout/stderr
Hard to debug what went wrong
issues.expected: Always return JSON with error details

issues.title: Error messages show duplicate information
symptoms: Error shows "(timeout: 0ms) (timeout: 30000ms)" - timeout reported twice
issues.expected: Single, clear timeout message

issues.title: Snapshot returns limited content on some React SPAs
symptoms: Airbnb page snapshot returns only 2 elements (Skip to content, alert)
Complex React SPAs with custom components have sparse accessibility trees
issues.expected: Snapshot should capture full accessibility tree for React SPAs

issues.title: captureResult delay too short for tooltips
symptoms: hover with captureResult returns visibleElements: []
100ms delay not enough for JS tooltips to render
issues.expected: Make delay configurable or increase default

issues.title: Snapshot shows tooltip role but no text content
symptoms: Snapshot shows '- tooltip' but not the tooltip text
issues.expected: Include tooltip content in snapshot

issues.title: Text selectors like button:has-text(...) timeout
symptoms: {"click": "button:has-text('Submit')"} times out
Button is visible in screenshot
Playwright-style :has-text() pseudo-selector not supported
issues.expected: Support :has-text() pseudo-selector or similar text matching

issues.title: Drag doesn't work on HTML5 range input sliders
symptoms: Drag returns {"dragged": true} but slider value doesn't change
Click-at-position on slider track works as workaround
issues.expected: Drag should move the slider thumb and update the value
issues.workaround: Use click-at-position on slider track or keyboard arrow keys

issues.title: New tab detection/tracking when links open in new tabs
symptoms: Click a link that opens in new tab, navigated: false returned
No indication that new tab opened
Agent must call chromeStatus to discover the new tab
issues.expected: Detect when click opens new tab, return info about new tab in response
issues.workaround: Use chromeStatus after clicks that may open new tabs

issues.title: getBoundingClientRect() returns empty object in eval
symptoms: eval with el.getBoundingClientRect() returns {}
DOMRect objects not automatically serialized
issues.expected: DOMRect should be serialized automatically or clearly documented

issues.title: Scroll reports incorrect position
symptoms: scroll with direction down returns scrollY: 0
Page appears to scroll but reported position is wrong
issues.expected: Scroll should report correct position after scrolling

issues.title: Session state accumulation causes issues after extended use
symptoms: After many operations on same tab, click starts timing out
Closing and reopening tab resolves it
issues.expected: Session should remain responsive after extended use

issues.title: Framework detection on page load
symptoms: Agents don't know what frameworks a page uses until they encounter issues
Early detection would allow proactive strategy adjustment
issues.expected: Add framework detection to goto and openTab responses

issues.title: Lazy selector resolution (eliminate stale refs)
symptoms: Cached element handles can become stale creating stale element errors
Re-resolving selector from scratch for every action would eliminate this class of errors
issues.expected: Never cache element references, re-resolve selector for every action

issues.title: MutationObserver-based waiting
symptoms: Polling at 100ms intervals is slower and uses more CPU than event-driven detection
issues.expected: Use MutationObserver for real-time DOM change detection

issues.title: XPath support
symptoms: Some DOM traversal patterns are awkward with CSS selectors
issues.expected: Add XPath selector support alongside CSS

issues.title: Innermost text matching
symptoms: Text matching can match parent elements containing same text as target child
Leads to wrong element clicks
issues.expected: Filter text matches to return only innermost matching elements

issues.title: Frame-scoped snapshots
symptoms: Large pages produce verbose snapshots
When target area is known, capturing only that portion improves efficiency
issues.expected: Support scoped snapshots via focusSelector

issues.title: Closed shadow DOM piercing
symptoms: Cannot access closed shadow roots via normal DOM APIs
issues.expected: Monkey-patch Element.attachShadow() to maintain WeakMap of closed shadow roots

issues.title: Frame-aware element identification
symptoms: Element refs are scoped to single frame context, requiring manual frame switching
issues.expected: Encode element IDs as frameOrdinal-backendNodeId pairs, support >> hop notation

issues.title: Adaptive depth handling
symptoms: Hard depth limits truncate DOM capture with no automatic recovery
issues.expected: Progressive depth reduction on encoder errors, re-hydrate missing branches

issues.title: Refs map inlined in every snapshot response
symptoms: Every snapshot response includes full refs map as inline JSON (CSS selectors keyed by ref ID)
HN: ~20KB of CSS selectors. ECMAScript spec: exceeds 1MB
Response size is 2-3x larger than actual snapshot content
issues.expected: Refs should be written to file or omitted from JSON entirely

issues.title: viewportSnapshot always included regardless of relevance
symptoms: snapshot with since and unchanged:true still sends 5-10KB viewportSnapshot
snapshotSearch sends full viewportSnapshot alongside targeted results
10-12KB of YAML per response on typical pages
issues.expected: viewportSnapshot should only be included on action responses

issues.title: Summary mode includes all refs inline
symptoms: Summary detail level includes ALL refs inline in JSON
ECMAScript spec: summary YAML ~100 bytes but response 1MB+ due to 28,329 refs
issues.expected: Summary mode should return zero refs

issues.title: Accessible names not truncated causing snapshot bloat
symptoms: GitHub commit message links have 500-2000 character accessible names
Amazon product names duplicated in parent link + child heading
Full snapshot on GitHub: 57KB (would be ~8KB with name truncation)
issues.expected: Names truncated to ~150 characters by default, with maxNameLength option

issues.title: Footer/boilerplate noise dominates snapshots
symptoms: Amazon homepage: 57% of interactive elements are footer links
Wikipedia: ~60-65% of viewport snapshot is site chrome
HN: table structure noise = ~35% of YAML
issues.expected: Option to exclude landmark roles or auto-scope to role=main
issues.workaround: Use {"snapshot": {"root": "role=main"}} to scope to main content

issues.title: Viewport snapshot includes fixed/sticky navigation in every response
symptoms: ECMAScript spec: fixed TOC sidebar is ~60% of every viewport snapshot
Wikipedia: banner + nav bars repeat in every viewport snapshot
Same banner content processed 5 times in a 5-action workflow
issues.expected: Option to exclude fixed/sticky elements or auto-detect and omit after first snapshot

issues.title: Headings and non-interactive elements have no refs in snapshotSearch
symptoms: snapshotSearch returns ref=None for all heading matches
Wikipedia: all 11 section headings return ref=None
Agents must fall back to unreliable text-based clicking
issues.expected: Headings should get refs as they are navigation targets

issues.title: Interactive detail level broken on link-dense pages
symptoms: HN: interactive (23,147 bytes) is LARGER than full (15,879 bytes)
Wikipedia: interactive saves only 12% vs full
Interactive removes headings needed for orientation while keeping low-value links
issues.expected: Interactive should always be strictly smaller than full

issues.title: since hash ignores element state changes
symptoms: Checkbox toggles don't change the hash
snapshot with since falsely reports unchanged after toggling checkboxes
Dropdown selection causes no hash change after selectOption
issues.expected: Hash should include lightweight checksum of interactive element states

issues.title: Combobox/select shows no value in snapshot
symptoms: select elements render as bare 'combobox [ref=s1e1]' with no selected value
After selecting Option 2, snapshot still shows just combobox
issues.expected: Display like combobox "Option 2" [ref=s1e1] showing selected option

issues.title: Table cell text missing in default snapshot
symptoms: td and th elements show as empty cell and columnheader without includeText
Default snapshot nearly useless for tabular data
issues.expected: Table cells should show text content by default
issues.workaround: Use extract step or snapshot with includeText: true

issues.title: snapshotSearch fuzzy matching too aggressive
symptoms: 'star' matches 'start', 'started' etc. (no word-boundary awareness)
No relevance scoring, long commit messages rank equally with navigation links
issues.expected: Default matching should use word boundaries, add fuzzy parameter for control

issues.title: snapshotSearch results lack state attributes
symptoms: Checkbox search returns refs but doesn't indicate checked status
Combobox search doesn't show selected value
Search matches don't include disabled, expanded, or name attributes
issues.expected: Add states field to search results

issues.title: snapshotSearch path context unhelpful on large pages
symptoms: HN: all matches share identical path with no disambiguation
ECMAScript spec: all headings show path 'generic' with no section hierarchy
issues.expected: Include article/section context in path with nearest named ancestor

issues.title: Unnamed buttons have no fallback text
symptoms: Buttons with no ARIA accessible name show as 'button [ref=s1e13]'
Agent cannot tell which button dismisses modal vs redirects
issues.expected: Fall back to innerText, value, title, or child text content

issues.title: SPA client-side navigation not detected
symptoms: Click on GitHub tab reports navigated: false
URL changes via history.pushState happen asynchronously after click resolves
Affects all SPAs: GitHub (Turbo), Next.js, Nuxt, React Router, Vue Router
issues.expected: Monkey-patch history.pushState/replaceState and detect URL changes within ~500ms
issues.workaround: Add explicit wait steps after every link click on SPAs

issues.title: Same-page anchor navigation causes full page reload
symptoms: goto with #hash fragment on same page causes full page reload
On ECMAScript spec (2.5MB page): anchor navigation takes 32 seconds instead of <1 second
issues.expected: Detect same-origin URL with only hash difference and use location.hash + scroll

issues.title: False modal detection from input placeholders
symptoms: GitHub search input placeholder reported as context.modal on every page load
Misleads agents into thinking a dialog is blocking interaction
issues.expected: context.modal should only be populated for role=dialog or role=alertdialog

issues.title: selectOption produces no diff/changes
symptoms: After selectOption, response has no changes field
Unlike click and fill, selectOption generates no diff
issues.expected: selectOption should produce diff showing value change

issues.title: Text-based click silently matches wrong element
symptoms: click with text 'History' matched navigation link instead of article heading
No disambiguation warning despite multiple matches
issues.expected: When click(text) finds multiple matches, return error listing all or prefer closest to viewport center

issues.title: HTML markup leaking into accessible names
symptoms: Amazon results heading contains raw HTML span tags in accessible name
HTML tags should be stripped from accessible name strings
issues.expected: Strip HTML tags from accessible names during snapshot generation

issues.title: Page reload invalidates CDP session with no recovery
symptoms: reload destroys CDP session entirely
Tab ID becomes invalid, all subsequent steps fail with CONNECTION error
Must open entirely new tab and redo all setup
issues.expected: Auto-reconnect to same tab after page reload

issues.title: Reconnect step for session recovery
symptoms: After session disconnect, no way to re-attach to same tab
Must use chromeStatus + openTab to start fresh, losing all state
issues.expected: Add reconnect step that tries to re-attach by URL pattern or tab ID

issues.title: Composite clickAndSnapshot step
symptoms: Click + snapshot is the most common two-step pattern
Requires two CLI invocations adding latency
issues.expected: Add clickAndSnapshot that performs both in one invocation

issues.title: waitForSettled step (DOM mutation quiet)
symptoms: After page loads or complex UI transitions, unclear what to wait for
wait requires knowing a specific selector or text
No way to say 'wait until the page stops changing'
issues.expected: waitForSettled step that waits for no DOM mutations for N milliseconds

issues.title: Auto-learning from failures
symptoms: Site profiles are entirely manual, agent must remember to call writeSiteProfile
Quirks discovered during sessions are lost if not explicitly recorded
Same failure patterns repeat across sessions
issues.expected: Auto-append discovered quirks to site profile after failures

issues.title: Clicking hidden radio/checkbox inputs via refs reports 'ok' status with a warnin
symptoms: Clicking hidden radio/checkbox inputs via refs reports 'ok' status with a warning about visibility, but does NOT actually toggle the input state. The click appears to succeed from the response but has no effect. This is misleading - either the click should actually work (e.g., by automatically clicking the associated label), or it should report a clearer failure indicating the input was not toggled. On demoqa.com, radio buttons and checkboxes use hidden inputs with visible CSS-styled labels, which is an extremely common pattern across modern web frameworks.

issues.title: TinyMCE editor on the-internet.herokuapp.com is permanently in read-only mode du
symptoms: TinyMCE editor on the-internet.herokuapp.com is permanently in read-only mode due to expired Tiny Cloud API key. The console shows 'All created TinyMCE editors are configured to be read-only' and 'you have no more editor loads available this month'. This means the test cannot be completed via normal user interaction (switchToFrame + fill/type). The only way to set content is via direct DOM manipulation through pageFunction, which bypasses the editor's read-only restriction. This test should either use a self-hosted TinyMCE instance without cloud licensing, or the test expectations should acknowledge that DOM manipulation is the expected approach.

implemented.title: Scroll deltaY timeout
implemented.implementedAs: JavaScript window.scrollBy() instead of CDP mouse wheel

implemented.title: switchToFrame doesn't change action context
implemented.implementedAs: Frame context DI via getFrameContext() injected into element-locator, aria, click-executor

implemented.title: Element refs go stale between snapshot and subsequent actions
implemented.implementedAs: Document-wide role+name search fallback for stale element references, inline re-resolution in JS click and verification paths

implemented.title: listFrames doesn't detect cross-origin iframes
implemented.implementedAs: DOM query supplement to Page.getFrameTree discovers cross-origin iframes and merges them tagged with crossOrigin: true

implemented.title: Network quiet detection
implemented.implementedAs: Best-effort waitForNetworkSettle (2s timeout, 300ms idle) auto-called after goto/reload/back/forward/openTab and before snapshot

implemented.title: Selectors don't pierce shadow DOM boundaries
implemented.implementedAs: Added shadowHostPath to ref metadata. Re-resolution now traverses shadow roots via stored host path, with last-resort scan of all shadow roots.

implemented.title: Summary reports 'Viewport elements: 0' incorrectly
implemented.implementedAs: Count semantic nodes (non-generic, non-staticText) as viewport elements since they passed isVisible() checks during tree construction

implemented.title: CDP clicks consistently fall back to jsClick-auto on React sites
